statements: UPDATE forestry_data SET tree_species='Oak', location='Forest A', area_covered=1500.75, deforestation_rate=3.75, reforestation_efforts='Planting new trees', ecosystem_preservation=true WHERE id=1;

UPDATE forestry_data SET deforestation_rate=2.50, location='Forest B', tree_species='Maple', ecosystem_preservation=false, reforestation_efforts='Community planting initiatives', area_covered=1200.00 WHERE id=2;
UPDATE forestry_data SET deforestation_rate = 2.75, area_covered = 500.25 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE forestry_data SET reforestation_efforts = 'Increased planting initiatives to preserve the ecosystem', ecosystem_preservation = TRUE WHERE tree_species = 'Oak';
UPDATE deforestation_data SET deforestation_rate = 0.5 WHERE location = 'Amazon Rainforest' AND date = '2021-10-01';
UPDATE reforestation_data SET reforestation_efforts = 'Planting new trees' WHERE date = '2021-11-15' AND location = 'Central Park';
UPDATE deforestation_data SET deforestation_rate = 0.75 WHERE location = 'Amazon' AND date = '2022-10-15';
UPDATE reforestation_data SET reforestation_efforts = 'Planting new trees' WHERE date = '2022-11-30' AND location = 'California';
UPDATE forest_data SET deforestation_rate = 3.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE tree_species SET average_height = 50, growth_rate = 2.2 WHERE species_id = 3;
UPDATE forest_data SET deforestation_rate = 2.5, reforestation_efforts = TRUE WHERE region = 'Amazon Forest';
UPDATE tree_species SET average_height = 50, growth_rate = 0.3 WHERE species_id = 3;
UPDATE DeforestationData SET deforestation_rate = 0.25 WHERE location = 'Amazon Forest'
UPDATE ReforestationEfforts SET success_rate = 0.85, trees_planted = 1000 WHERE id = 3
UPDATE DeforestationData SET deforestation_rate = 0.25, date_recorded = '2021-10-15' WHERE location = 'Amazon Forest';
UPDATE ReforestationEfforts SET success_rate = 0.85 WHERE location = 'California';
UPDATE Forests SET location = 'Amazon' WHERE forest_id = 1;
UPDATE ReforestationEfforts SET reforestation_date = '2023-05-15' WHERE reforestation_id = 2;
UPDATE Forests SET location = 'Amazon Rainforest' WHERE forest_id = 1;
UPDATE ReforestationEfforts SET reforestation_method = 'Tree Planting' WHERE reforestation_id = 5;
